contents.text: Thank you for calling Grove Collaborative, your source for healthy, beautiful home essentials.
For orders, subscriptions, or account inquiries, press 1.
For order status and tracking, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our order support team.

navigationGoals: I need to check the delivery status and tracking details for my recent order.
Check the shipping status of my recent Grove order of household cleaning products.
I need to retrieve the shipment tracking details and ETA for my recent order.
Check the delivery status of my recent order
I need to check the estimated delivery date for my latest cleaning supplies order.

contents.text: To update your subscription or account details, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you with our account services department.

navigationGoals: I need to update the shipping address on my Grove subscription.
Change the shipping address and adjust the delivery schedule for my monthly subscription box.
I want to adjust my auto-replenishment cadence and update my payment credentials for my subscription.
Update my subscription payment details
I'd like to change the shipping address on my recurring subscription.

contents.text: For product information, tips, or sustainability support, press 2.
For product ingredients and usage guidance, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: I need ingredient information and usage instructions for your multipurpose cleaner.
Find out if the new surface cleaner contains harsh chemicals and how to use it safely.
I'd like a deep-dive on the ingredient composition and application protocol for the new eco surface cleaner.
Ask about ingredients and safe use of a cleaning product
Can you tell me the recommended dilution ratio for the concentrate surface cleaner?

contents.text: For eco-friendly home tips and sustainability advice, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you with our sustainability team.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for eco-friendly tips to make my home cleaning routine more sustainable.
Get advice on sustainable cleaning routines to reduce waste and environmental impact.
I'm seeking best-practice guidance on optimizing my home's sustainability metrics and zero-waste cleaning regimen.
Get eco-friendly home cleaning tips suited for seniors
I'm looking for eco-friendly cleaning tips to reduce plastic waste at home.
